goal.ch: 本課程將介紹影響沉積物化學的因素和過程，以及這些因素和過程與全球環境變遷的關係。這門課程建議學生先修普通化學，對酸/鹼化學、氧化還原化學、熱力學和化學平衡有基本的理解。
goal.en: This course will introduce the factors and processes affecting sediment chemistry, as well as the relationship between these factors and processes and global environmental change. It is recommended that students have a basic understanding of general chemistry including the topics of acid/base chemistry, redox chemistry, thermodynamics, and chemical equilibrium before taking this course.

outline.ch: 本課程探討影響沉積物化學的因素和(化學、物理、生物、地質)作用。學生將對沉積物地球化學有更深入的認識，包括沉積物的初始成分以及早期成岩過程。這些過程與有機物降解和物理埋藏相關，且將促成其他的化學和礦物學變化。建議學生具備普通化學背景（包括酸鹼化學、氧化還原化學、熱力學和化學平衡），以及對普通地質核心內容的理解。
outline.en: This course covers the factors and processes that affect sediment chemistry. Students will become familiar with sediments including their initial composition and early diagenetic processes, associated with the degradation of organic matter and physical burial, produce additional chemical and mineralogical changes. It is recommended that students have a background in general chemistry (including acid/base chemistry, redox chemistry, thermodynamics, and chemical equilibria) as well as a solid understanding of the central principles of general geology.
